Title: Modelworker women's screen (two)
Publisher: Huanqiu heji shupian chubanshe (环球和技术篇出版社), Shanghai
Notes: Liang Jun (梁军, 1930-2020), one of China's first female tractor drivers. She wears a flower shaped award with a ribbon that says "劳動模範" - model worker.This poster is part of a series of four. Only two are in the IISH collection; the other one features Luo Shufang, model factory worker.
